categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: The Noola system was a star system that was located within the Relgim sector, in the Outer Rim Territories and New Territories regions of the galaxy.
The system was home to the sentient Noolan species.
The Noola system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square L-5.
